polito.sdp2017.Components

Class HardwareProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • polito.sdp2017.Components.HardwareProperties

  • public class HardwareProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    It's the class for modeling the hardware properties that both an IP and a FPGAConfiguration should have. It's a sort of super-attribute characterized by the number of LUT, FF, memories and the maximum latency, power consuption and clock frequency.
